div.class: relative isolate overflow-hidden bg-white px-6 py-24 sm:py-32 lg:overflow-visible lg:px-0

svg.class: absolute left-[max(50%,25rem)] top-0 h-[64rem] w-[128rem] -translate-x-1/2 stroke-gray-200 [mask-image:radial-gradient(64rem_64rem_at_top,white,transparent)]

div.class: mx-auto grid max-w-2xl grid-cols-1 gap-x-8 gap-y-16 lg:mx-0 lg:max-w-none lg:grid-cols-2 lg:items-start lg:gap-y-10

h1.class: mt-2 text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gray-900 sm:text-4xl

div.p: Put together for CoreTrek to evaluate candidate

img.class: hidden lg:inline mt-5 w-[48rem] max-w-none rounded-xl border-2 border-red-400 shadow-xl ring-1 ring-gray-400/10 sm:w-[34rem]
hidden lg:inline mt-5 w-[48rem] max-w-none rounded-xl border-2 border-grey-500 shadow-xl ring-1 ring-gray-400/10 sm:w-[34rem]

div.class: lg:col-span-2 lg:col-start-1 lg:row-start-2 lg:mx-auto lg:grid lg:w-full lg:max-w-7xl lg:grid-cols-2 lg:gap-x- lg:px-8

li.span: Code skill and technical preview for Kenneth Hauklien

span.span:
Herd gives this site URL: https://laravel-ct-preview.test/
This project was buildt using Laravel Herd and uses Vite bulder with React front-end rendering. For simpicity db storage is set to sqlite3. The frontend uses Typescript for better code quality.

code.class: mt-5 text-sm sm:text-base inline-flex text-left items-center space-x-4 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-lg p-4 pl-6

ul.class: mt-6 max-w-md space-y-1 text-gray-500 list-inside dark:text-gray-400
ul.li: Herd / XAMP / Docker (Sails) or other setup with PHP 8.3

code.class: mt-5 text-sm sm:text-base inline-flex text-left items-center space-x-4 bg-gray-800 text-white rounded-lg p-4 pl-6
